description:
Mr. Dawn is the tentative number six of the Burial Agency. He is not an actual fighter, so he is only considered to be the sixth member together with his partner (whose identity isn`t specified, but is hinted to be http://anidb.net/ch31686 [Caren Ortensia]).
He is a pacifist, and lack any fighting prowess, special ability, knowledge of thaumaturgy or even strong faith. He is still considered an irreplaceable exorcist under certain conditions, being the only person to exorcise a full grown demon from a person. He is prophesied to perform tree more such exorcisms in his lifetime.
Source: typemoon.wikia.com
name: Mister Dawn
